name: <Demography contribution fields>
description: Fields coming from demography contribution study (available only when it is active), see demography_contribution.csv.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: user_data_bot
description: 1 if the given user is identified as a bot.

name: user_data_domain
description: Domain associated to the user in SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_gender
description: User gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: user_data_multi_org_names
description: List of the user organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_org_name
description: User's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: component_name
description: Name of the component the unit belongs to.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Creation date of the unit change

name: is_weblate_message
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the unit change was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: project_name
description: Name of the project the unit belongs to.

name: translation_api_url
description: Translation API URL, following the pattern /api/translations/(project_name)/(component_name)/(translation_name).

name: tz
description: Timezone in which the unit change was made by its original author.

name: unit_content_hash
description: Unique identifier of the source string.

name: unit_fuzzy
description: Whether the unit is fuzzy or marked for review.

name: unit_has_comment
description: Field containing '1' if the unit has comments. It allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: unit_has_failing_check
description: Field containing '1' if the unit has failing checks. It allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: unit_has_suggestion
description: Field containing '1' if the unit has suggestions. It allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: unit_location
description: Location of the unit in source code.

name: unit_previous_source
description: Previous source string used for fuzzy matching.

name: unit_translation
description: URL of a related translation object.

name: unit_web_url
description: URL where the unit can be edited.
